Hero.description: I am Joseph, a Systems Engineering student at UNAB and a frontend developer with a very personal vision of design. My path began in school, when I was studying electronics and discovered Arduino; that's where I understood that programming made me feel at home.

jobs.description: I have led the development of several innovative applications, including platforms for selling music courses and applications focused on disease monitoring and prevention. I have also created solutions for pest control and an application aimed at improving reading comprehension in Colombia. Additionally, I have incorporated data analysis tools such as Google Analytics and Firebase to evaluate the impact of my applications and continuously improve the user experience. I have developed dashboards to monitor performance, enabling data-driven decision making. To ensure project quality and efficiency, I implemented agile methodologies, promoting collaboration and constant communication within the team. I integrated CI/CD practices, which helped reduce deployment times and improve software delivery efficiency. My focus is on creating technological solutions that address real-world needs and contribute to social development. I always look for new opportunities to innovate, learn new tools and collaborate on projects that have a positive impact on the community.

education.role: Technician in Implementation and Maintenance of Industrial Electronics

Connect.title: Ready to work together?
Connect.description: I am currently open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll do my best to get back to you!
